title: Classic 7 Layer Salad
directions: -Place 3 cups of the lettuce in bottom of large bowl; sprinkle with salt and pepper.
-Layer egg slices over lettuce in bowl and sprinkle with more salt and pepper.
-Continue to layer vegetables in this order: peas, remaining lettuce, crumbled bacon, and shredded cheese, along with sprinklings of salt and pepper.

-Combine sugar and mayonnaise; spread on top, spreading to edge of bowl to cover entire salad. -Cover and chill overnight or up to 24 hours. Garnish with green onions and paprika. Toss before serving.
ingredients: 1/2 cup green pepper (some red, if desired)
1/4 cup green onions with tops, sliced
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen green peas, uncooked
1 cup Hellmann's Light Mayo (or your favorite brand)
